::Prowl/FZ/Kluster/Perndabot/Grimmler/Firearm::

Prowl lands for a second as Angel Prime walks up to him. He looks 
over at Hot Rod as the other bot also walks up.

"Chased them off?" he replies in surprise at Angel Prime's comment, 
sensing over 20 enemies still at battle, "There's still a horde of 
them!"

Prowl jumps to the side as FZ flies by, swearing when one of FZ's 
energy-draining missiles explodes right next to him. He rolls out of 
the blue field, feeling most of his energy gone. Prowl stumbles 
sideways, his systems regaining energy.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Perndabot smashes into the ground hard, skidding several feet and 
coming to a complete stop. He groans, beginning to get up.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Kluster nods as he hears Chordate acknowledge the lockdown. He dives 
out of the way of several shots, Manterror's ion disks cutting 
through the armor in his arm but missing any major circuits.

Kluster turns and swears as he sees two bots trying to get into the 
Cybertronian Fire. He grabbs a missile launcher from a storage 
compartment, firing two missiles at the ground next to Firestarter 
and Unitron. That way he had no chance of missing the bots and 
hitting the CF.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Grimmler looks up at the battle between the two giant gestalts that 
was taking place near him. He aims his missile launcher, firing two 
missiles at the back of Oblitertron's left knee.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Firearm runs into the battle, transforming into tank mode and firing 
charges and missiles at Double Punch.
